Package tiled.core

Interface Summary
MapChangeListener Gets notified about changes made to a map.
TilesetChangeListener A tileset listener can get notified about changes to a tileset through receiving TilesetChangedEvents.
 

Class Summary
AnimatedTile Animated tiles take advantage of the Sprite class internally to handle animation using an array of tiles.
LayerLockedException This exception is thrown when an attempt is made to perform a modification on a locked layer.
Map The Map class is the focal point of the tiled.core package.
MapChangedEvent  
MapLayer A layer of a map.
MapObject An object occupying an ObjectGroup.
MultilayerPlane MultilayerPlane makes up the core functionality of both Maps and Brushes.
ObjectGroup A layer containing map objects.
Sprite  
Tile The core class for our tiles.
TileLayer A TileLayer is a specialized MapLayer, used for tracking two dimensional tile data.
TileSet todo: Update documentation
TilesetChangedEvent An event indicating that a certain tileset changed.
